title: How Python asyncio works: recreating it from scratch

digraph asyncio_diagram{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor="#f9f9f9", fontname="Arial"]; edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=10, color="#555555"];subgraph cluster_generators{label="Generators Review";style=dashed;node[style="filled", fillcolor="#e0f7fa"];gen_function[label="Generator Function
